title: Good Loser Kumagawa - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Psychological   School Life   Shounen   Supernatural
tags: Antihero Protagonist   Based on an Anime   Cunning Protagonist   Distrustful Protagonist   Emotionally Weak Protagonist   Hated Protagonist   Loner Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Overpowered Protagonist   Perverted Protagonist   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Psychopaths   Special Abilities   Twisted Personality   Unlucky Protagonist
author: Nisio Isin
description:
The sub-series takes place two months before Kumagawa transfers to Hakoniwa Academy, and details his time at Suisou Academy.
This is the story of Kumagawa's one month-long battle with Saki Sukinasaki, a battle that ended with the closure of Suisou Academy and no winner.>
